node.title: Las Vegas Raiders star Henry Ruggs faces DUI charge in deadly crash
node.description: Ruggs, 22, remained on the scene and "showed signs of impairment," police said. He was transported to a local hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.
node.content: ["Las Vegas Raiders star Henry Ruggs III is facing a felony DUI charge in a collision that left another person dead early Tuesday morning, local police said.\u00a0", "Police said they responded to a collision between a Chevrolet Corvette and a Toyota Rav4. They said the Toyota was on fire and fire department officials located a deceased victim inside.\u00a0", "Meanwhile, Ruggs, 22, remained on the scene and \"showed signs of impairment,\" police said. He was transported to a local hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.\u00a0", "Police said a preliminary investigation indicated that the front of the Chevrolet collided with the rear of the Toyota. The investigation is ongoing.\u00a0", "Justin is an assistant managing editor at CBS News. Reach him at: justin@cbsnews.com."]
